mapper.select: SELECT TX_ID AS txId, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, CHANGE_BEFORE_FAC_GUBUN_CODE AS changeBeforeFacGubunCode, CHANGE_BEFORE_FAC_CODE AS changeBeforeFacCode, CHANGE_AFTER_FAC_GUBUN_CODE AS changeAfterFacGubunCode, CHANGE_AFTER_FAC_CODE AS changeAfterFacCode, CHANGE_AFTER_FAC_NAME AS changeAfterFacName, CHANGE_AFTER_CORP_NAME AS changeAfterCorpName, CHANGE_AFTER_HIRE_FEE AS changeAfterHireFee FROM ATMS_02001190

SELECT TX_ID AS txId, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, CHANGE_BEFORE_FAC_GUBUN_CODE AS changeBeforeFacGubunCode, CHANGE_BEFORE_FAC_CODE AS changeBeforeFacCode, CHANGE_AFTER_FAC_GUBUN_CODE AS changeAfterFacGubunCode, CHANGE_AFTER_FAC_CODE AS changeAfterFacCode, CHANGE_AFTER_FAC_NAME AS changeAfterFacName, CHANGE_AFTER_CORP_NAME AS changeAfterCorpName, CHANGE_AFTER_HIRE_FEE AS changeAfterHireFee FROM ATMS_02001190 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001190 SET STEXT_GUBUN = #{stextGubun}, CHANGE_BEFORE_FAC_GUBUN_CODE = #{changeBeforeFacGubunCode}, CHANGE_BEFORE_FAC_CODE = #{changeBeforeFacCode}, CHANGE_AFTER_FAC_GUBUN_CODE = #{changeAfterFacGubunCode}, CHANGE_AFTER_FAC_CODE = #{changeAfterFacCode}, CHANGE_AFTER_FAC_NAME = #{changeAfterFacName}, CHANGE_AFTER_CORP_NAME = #{changeAfterCorpName}, CHANGE_AFTER_HIRE_FEE = #{changeAfterHireFee} WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001190 ( TX_ID, STEXT_GUBUN, CHANGE_BEFORE_FAC_GUBUN_CODE, CHANGE_BEFORE_FAC_CODE, CHANGE_AFTER_FAC_GUBUN_CODE, CHANGE_AFTER_FAC_CODE, CHANGE_AFTER_FAC_NAME, CHANGE_AFTER_CORP_NAME, CHANGE_AFTER_HIRE_FEE ) VALUES ( #{txId}, #{stextGubun}, #{changeBeforeFacGubunCode}, #{changeBeforeFacCode}, #{changeAfterFacGubunCode}, #{changeAfterFacCode}, #{changeAfterFacName}, #{changeAfterCorpName}, #{changeAfterHireFee} )
